optionresponse.p: The kinetic energy of the ball is 1/3 of the total energy when the ball is at a height of 2 meters
The kinetic energy of the ball is 1/3 of the total energy when the ball is at a height of 4 meters
The kinetic energy of the ball is 1/3 of the total energy when the ball is at a height of 6 meters
The kinetic energy of the ball is 1/3 of the total energy when the ball is at a height of 8 meters
